hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Asim bin Laqit bin Sabirah that his father said:"I said: 'O Messenger of Allah, tell me about Wudu." He said: 'Perform Wudu' well,[1] and exxagerate in sniffing water up into your nose, except when you are fasting.'" [1]See No

chapter.eng-name: Exaggerating In Snuffing Water Into The Nose
